snippet.title: X-PIPES EVOLUTION extended
snippet.description:
Let's pipe it up again!

X-Pipes Evolution it's a revamped version of the old Factor Software's classic MacPipes.
It keeps the same familiar gameplay of it successful predecessor while adding eye-poppin' cartoonish graphics, mind relaxing music and high quality sound effects.

In this game you play the role of a tiny robot plumber called Roderick in a quest to solve plumbing problems scattered over several different worlds.

Your goal is to hook up pipe parts on a grid to create a pipeline of required
length before the fluid reaches the last connected pipe.

Can you help Roderick to save his universe from flooding?


Game features
-------------
- 32 different levels divided into 8 worlds plus extra challenging levels.
- 3 difficulty levels.
- Eye-poppin' cartoonish graphics.
- Mind relaxing music.
- High quality sound effects.
- Simple and intuitive gameplay.
- Online high scores.
- A cute robot character.


Requirements:
---------------------
OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard or later.

Music:
---------
http://www.nosoapradio.us/
